text: The Sheffield Amateur League was a football competition for clubs in the Sheffield area of England. For many years it was behind only the Sheffield Association League in terms of seniority in the Sheffield and Hallamshire Football Association area. ==Honours== ===League champions=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;
